question: What significant cultural title does the Old Town of Toruń, Poland hold since 1997?
true_answer: It is listed as a UNESCO World Heritage Site.
asked_question_translated: Hvilken viktig kulturell tittel har gamlebyen i Toruń i Polen hatt siden 1997?
answer: Gamlebyen i Toruń i Polen har hatt tittelen som UNESCOs verdensarvliste siden 1997.
answer_translated_eng: The Old Town of Toruń in Poland has held the title of UNESCO World Heritage Site since 1997.
